title: Update TUI config tests to use correct config types
description:
**Summary:**
TUI config tests fail due to incorrect config type usage and config mismatch issues.

**Affected Test Files:**
- `tests/config/test_tui_config.py` (4 failures)
- `tests/config/test_tool_config.py` (2 failures)

**Investigation Tasks:**
1. Check which config type tests should be using
2. Verify TUI-specific fields are being tested correctly
3. Update test fixtures to use proper config instances

**Related Issues:**
- SOUL-361: Config type mismatches in profile loading
- SOUL-366: ConsoulConfig tests using wrong type

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] All 6 TUI/tool config tests pass
- [ ] Tests use correct config types
